summary: Worked beautifully to begin with but now crashes

description: simple and powerful app, with a built in converter (different bitrates, mp3 / m4a) . I use it to convert youtube videos to audio books and downloading songs I like. It will easily download even a long (hours) video, online converters often fails with those.
Has worked for some time, but not anymore...
Das Tool ist Super nur im Softwarecenter wird die aktuellste Version nicht eingespielt
summary: Super Tool benötigt dringend ein Update!

description: es muy sencillo de utilizar ,, me encanto
